hymn.title: Books of the Bible - Old Testament
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C - C/E - | Dm/F - Dm - | G - G/B - | C - G7 - | C - C/E - | F - Dm - | C/G - G7 - | C/G F/C C - | C - C/E - | Dm/F - Dm - | G - G/B - | C - G7 - | C - C/E - | Dm/F - Dm - | C/G - G7 - | C/G G7 C - | C - C/E - | Dm/F - Dm - | G - G/B - | C - G7 - | C - C/E - | Dm/F - Dm - | C/G - G7 - | C G7 C - |

layout.singingstanza: Ge -- ne -- sis and Ex -- o -- dus, Le -- vi -- ti -- cus, Num -- bers, Deu -- te -- ron -- o -- my, Josh -- ua, Judg -- es, Ruth, First and Sec -- ond Sam -- uel, and First and Sec -- ond Kings; First and Sec -- ond Chron -- i -- cles, then Ez -- ra, Ne -- he -- mi -- ah, Es -- ther, Job, the book of Psalms, Pro -- verbs, Ec -- cle -- si -- as -- tes, Song of Songs, I -- sa -- iah, Je -- re -- mi -- ah, La -- men -- ta -- tions, and E -- ze -- ki -- el; Dan -- iel, Ho -- se -- a, Jo -- el, A -- mos, O -- ba -- di -- ah, Jo -- nah, Mi -- cah, Na -- hum, Ha -- bak -- kuk, Ze -- pha -- ni -- ah, Hag -- gai, Ze -- cha -- ri -- ah, Mal -- a -- chi.
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2007 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Genesis and Exodus, Leviticus, Numbers, Deuteronomy, Joshua, Judges, Ruth, First and Second Samuel, and First and Second Kings; First and Second Chronicles, then Ezra, Nehemiah, Esther, Job, the book of Psalms, Proverbs, Ecclesiastes, Song of Songs, Isaiah, Jeremiah, Lamentations, and Ezekiel; Daniel, Hosea, Joel, Amos, Obadiah, Jonah, Micah, Nahum, Habakkuk, Zephaniah, Haggai, Zechariah, Malachi.
© 2007 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission. Visit BibleStorySongs.com to order CD's & Sheet Music.
